custom_css: a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.heading-text-columns_text:
Wool blend insulation combines the natural benefits of wool with the durability of recycled polyester, making it an ideal choice for maintaining warmth and regulating moisture in homes and offices. Sourced locally, woolâ€™s natural properties allow it to absorb excess humidity and release it when needed, creating a comfortable living environment year-round.

This insulation is especially effective in controlling heat loss, ensuring your spaces remain warm in winter and cool in summer. Contact us

custom_css: a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_1:
Our wool blend insulation stands out as a sustainable alternative to traditional fibreglass and glasswool insulation, which can pose health risks similar to asbestosis.

By choosing our product, you contribute to reducing landfill waste, as it is crafted from recycled textiles. This not only makes it eco-friendly but also reinforces its position as one of the most sustainable insulation materials available in New Zealand.
settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_2: Available in both roll and batt forms, our insulation comes in various R-values, allowing you to select the level of thermal protection that best suits your needs. Contact us

settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_1:
Specifications
Density: 100-5000 GSM
Thickness: 30-275mm
R-value: 0.6-4.1
Width: 380-3200mm
Format: Rolls and batts
settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_2:
Applications
Wall and ceiling insulation to moderate temperature fluctuations
Temperature-controlled packaging
Ducting thermal insulation
